#### Changelogs
##### v1.0.13- 01/03/2025

- add manifest permissions for `cookies` and `webRequest`
- add `Delivery to` cookie for Amazon product page (background script)
- add translator event handler for Nike product page (content script)
- fix bugs for get price in Nike product page
- change price convert utils 
- add/update logic product details pages (all marketplace sources)

##### v1.0.12- 12/26/2024

- fix bugs of prices in Nike, Adidas color swatch 
- Add event bus with `mitt`
- Add bus events in `QuickBuy` and content scripts

##### v1.0.10- 12/16/2024
- Use `message` instead `Custom Event` for `PreCart` component
- Change `addToCart` new events, debounce click add cart, changes a texts
- Add loading state and avoid spam clicks
- Add logs panel for debugs
- Change content script for Hanaichi shopping pre cart
- Add some features for product info in `utils`
- Fix background service conflict and remove unused codes

##### v1.0.9- 12/04/2024
- Add new `matches` content for `Mercari`
- Add new actions to `QuickBuy` for: `amazon`, `adidas`, `nike`, `coach`, `mk`, `mercari`

##### v1.0.8- 11/19/2024
- Change `product` structs flow `fast order` structs
- Update `marketplaceProductUtils` for: `amazon`, `adidas`, `nike`, `coach`, `mk`, `mercari` 
- Update `contents` for `Hanaichi Cart`
